title: Health Minister announces first decision to provide psychological counseling to injured in Gen Z protests
snippet: Sudha Sharma Gautam has officially assumed her duties. Upon taking office, she announced her first decision: providing psychological counseling services to those injured during the Gen Z demonstration.

title: Sudha Sharma Gautam - Wikipedia
snippet: Dr. Sudha Sharma Gautam (Nepali: डा. सुधा शर्मा गौतम) is a Nepalese politician and senior obstetrician-gynecologist who has served as a minister of health and population in the Sushila Karki led interim Government since 26 October 2025.

title: Prime Minister Karki inducts two new ministers
snippet: Sudha Sharma Gautam takes charge of health and population, while Bablu Gupta is appointed minister for youth and sports.

title: New Health Minister Dr. Sudha Sharma prioritizes mental health, pledges transparency - The Himalayan Times - Nepal's No.1 English Daily Newspaper | Nepal News, Latest Politics, Business, World, Sports, Entertainment, Travel, Life Style News
snippet: The newly appointed Minister for Health and Population, Dr. Sudha Sharma, assumed office on Sunday.
